item.description:
Join us for a presentation by Chris Royston. He was born in the United States but moved to Spain with his family when he was a child and grew up there during the 1960's. He returns there often to visit family, and he has a website, www.likeaspaniard.com, in which he shares his knowledge of the language, the culture and the country. He will speak about his experiences growing up in Spain. The presentation will be in Spanish.

Please bring food to share.

Please contact me if you have questions: Karen Dworski at kdwo543210@yahoo.com

Directions from Route 84:

Take exit 39 toward CT-4/Farmington
0.5 mi
Merge onto CT-508
0.5 mi
Slight right at CT-4/Farmington Ave
0.9 mi
Turn right at CT-10/Waterville Rd
4.1 mi
Turn left at Pine Hill Rd
0.4 mi
Take the 1st right onto Wilcox Ln
0.1 mi
Turn right at Knollwood Ln
0.1 mi.

group.name: The Hartford Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: Growing Up in Spain in the 1960's
